item.title: Aspose.Imaging for SharePoint 1.0.0
item.description: Aspose.Imaging for SharePoint is designed to be used with Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010 and SharePoint Foundation 2010. There are no additional system requirements besides Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010. Aspose.Imaging for SharePoint provides conversion via an ECB menu (Edit Control Block). The Convert Image option is added to the ECB menu after successful installation
